remoteClasses.name: CrowdDetectorFilter
remoteClasses.doc: Filter that detects people agglomeration in video streams

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the filter belongs

params.name: rois
params.doc: Regions of interest for the filter

properties.name: processingWidth
properties.doc: The processing image will be resized to this width (in pixels)

properties.name: x
properties.doc: Percentage relative to the image width to calculate the X coordinate of the point [0..1]

properties.name: y
properties.doc: Percentage relative to the image height to calculate the Y coordinate of the point [0..1]

complexTypes.name: RelativePoint
complexTypes.doc: Relative points in a physical screen, values are a percentage relative to the image dimensions. X left to right and Y top to down.

properties.name: occupancyLevelMin
properties.doc: minimun occupancy percentage in the ROI to send occupancy events

properties.name: occupancyLevelMed
properties.doc: send occupancy level = 1 if the occupancy percentage is between occupancy_level_min and this level

properties.name: occupancyLevelMax
properties.doc:
send occupancy level = 2 if the occupancy percentage is between occupancy_level_med and this level,
and send occupancy level = 3 if the occupancy percentage is between this level and 100

properties.name: occupancyNumFramesToEvent
properties.doc:
number of consecutive frames that a new occupancy level has to be detected to recognize it as a occupancy level change.
A new occupancy event will be send

properties.name: fluidityLevelMin
properties.doc: minimun fluidity percentage in the ROI to send fluidity events

properties.name: fluidityLevelMed
properties.doc: send fluidity level = 1 if the fluidity percentage is between fluidity_level_min and this level

properties.name: fluidityLevelMax
properties.doc:
send fluidity level = 2 if the fluidity percentage is between fluidity_level_med and this level,
 and send fluidity level = 3 if the fluidity percentage is between this level and 100

properties.name: fluidityNumFramesToEvent
properties.doc:
number of consecutive frames that a new fluidity level has to be detected to recognize it as a fluidity level change.
 A new fluidity event will be send

properties.name: sendOpticalFlowEvent
properties.doc: Enable/disable the movement direction detection into the ROI

properties.name: opticalFlowNumFramesToEvent
properties.doc:
number of consecutive frames that a new direction of movement has to be detected to recognize a new movement direction. 
 A new direction event will be send

properties.name: opticalFlowNumFramesToReset
properties.doc: number of consecutive frames in order to reset the counter of repeated directions

properties.name: opticalFlowAngleOffset
properties.doc:
Direction of the movement. The angle could have four different values: 
 left (0), up (90), right (180) and down (270). This cartesian axis could be rotated adding an angle offset

complexTypes.name: RegionOfInterestConfig
complexTypes.doc: data structure for configuration of CrowdDetector regions of interest

properties.name: points
properties.doc: list of points delimiting the region of interest

properties.name: regionOfInterestConfig
properties.doc: data structure for configuration of CrowdDetector regions of interest

properties.name: id
properties.doc:
identifier of the region of interest. The string used for the id must begin 
 with a letter followed by an alphanumeric character included (/-_.:+)

complexTypes.name: RegionOfInterest
complexTypes.doc: Region of interest for some events in a video processing filter

properties.name: fluidityPercentage
properties.doc: Percentage of fluidity in the ROI

properties.name: fluidityLevel
properties.doc: Level of fluidity in the ROI

properties.name: roiID
properties.doc: Opaque String indicating the id of the involved ROI

events.name: CrowdDetectorFluidity
events.doc: Event raise when a level of fluidity is detected in a ROI

properties.name: occupancyPercentage
properties.doc: Percentage of occupancy in the ROI

properties.name: occupancyLevel
properties.doc: Level of occupancy in the ROI

properties.name: roiID
properties.doc: Opaque String indicating the id of the involved ROI

events.name: CrowdDetectorOccupancy
events.doc: Event raise when a level of occupancy is detected in a ROI

properties.name: directionAngle
properties.doc: Direction angle of the detected movement in the ROI

properties.name: roiID
properties.doc: Opaque String indicating the id of the involved ROI

events.name: CrowdDetectorDirection
events.doc: Event raise when a movement direction is detected in a ROI
